title: Rowley Wristwear
summary: Adorn your smartwatch with patterns and designs from Cynthia Rowley.
description: Take a glimpse into the creative world of Cynthia Rowley with this beautifully designed watch face. Rowley Smartwatch features a stunning selection of patterns that unlock through delicate animations as the day progresses.
descriptionHTML: Take a glimpse into the creative world of Cynthia Rowley with this beautifully designed watch face. Rowley Smartwatch features a stunning selection of patterns that unlock through delicate animations as the day progresses.
comments: Terrible. Has a few different designs but you can't choose any. Constantly crashes.
Very cute BUT--- It DONT stay on.. It's a shame cuZ it's really cute... All that shows is Just white numbers on a black background... SMH.
Stuck in military time. No option to change. What's up with all these new watch faces without a 12-hour option?? Uninstalled!
Deep breath Can not change from military time. Screen went black after a few minutes and could only see Cynthia Rowley name.
Never worked Installed and uninstalled several times and never worked
